form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 Form FS-510 (English-Chinese) 2-68 DEPARTMENT OF STATE Form Approved Budget Bureau No. 47-R0150 APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION ₹ INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by .typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be só marked. If there is insufficient room on the form. answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. +**** 1. Family name () First name and middle name (6) TANG Man 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) none 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) 6772 4. Date of birth Chinese (Year) (Month) A (Day) a Western (Day) a (Month) A (Year) if calendar calendar 25 August 1915 5. Age () 6. Place of birth (Give in Chinese and English) 58 (Country) (Province) (District) (Heung) (Village) China Kwangtung Mou-ning -Sun-tung Sun-tung 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Chinese was FG Including my present marriage, I have been married 1 times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address Herbalist A-2 4th fl. Hong Keung Bldg. Bong Keung St. Kowloon 12. Purpose in going to the United States 13. Name and address of wife/husband (give maiden name of wife) resettlement WONG Kwong Ha deceased on 2/4/1971 in HK 14. Names and addresses of children under 21 years of age none 15. Person(s) named in 13 and 14 (will) (will not) accompany or follow me to the United States (Cross out words that do not apply) 16. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 17. Intended port of entry permanently Los Angeles 18. Final address in the United States 19. Do you have a ticket to final destination? 617 Joshua Ave. Parker Arizona 85344 NO 20. Person you intend to join (Give name, address and relationship, if any) Patricia Pik Ling TENG daughter) 617 Joshua Ave., Parker Arizona 85344 U.S.A. 21. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If different from 20) OF same as above 22. Personal description 23. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height E #*** black 5 feet R 2 inches none (b) Color of eyes same (d) Complexion dark brown yellow THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
